title: Understanding the Middle East & the Muslim World (Kindle Col
description:
A collection of Kindle books covering (in one way or another) the history, politics and culture of the Middle East and the Muslim World. The collection includes many books about the Israel-Palestine conflict and US foreign policy. The books are listed below:

1948_ A History of the First Arab-Israeli War - Prof. Benny Morris

51 Documents - Lenni Brenner

A Concise History of the Arabs - John McHugo

A History of Christianity - Diarmaid MacCulloch

A Short History of World War I - Stokesbury, James L

A Tragic Legacy - Glenn Greenwald

A War of Choice_ The British in Afghanistan 2003-09 -- Fairweather, Jack

Africa (Beginner's Guides) - Young, Tom

Against Our Better Judgment_ The Hidden History of How the US Was Used to Create Israel - Alison Weir

America's Deadliest Export - Blum, William

Antisemitism_ A Very Short Introduction - Steven Beller

Benghazi_ The Definitive Report - Brandon Webb

Beware of Small States_ Lebanon, Battleground of the Middle East - Hirst, David

Blackwater _ The Rise of the World's Most Powerful Mercenary Army - Scahill, Jeremy

Christianity_ A Very Short Introduction - Woodhead, Linda

Contracted_ America's Secret Warriors - Kerry Patton

Cruel Britannia_ A Secret History of Torture - Cobain, Ian

Cursed Victory_ A History of Israel and the Occupied Territories - Ahron Bregman

Defending the Holy Land  - Zeez Maoz

Dining with al-Qaeda_ Three Decades of Exploring the Many Worlds of the Middle East - Pope, Hugh

Dirty Wars - Scahill, Jeremy

Empire_ A Very Short Introduction - Howe, Stephen

Engaging the Muslim World - Juan Cole

Fiasco - Thomas E. Ricks

Fiasco Graphics & Photos - Thomas E. Ricks

Free Speech_ A Very Short Introduction - Warburton, Nigel

Ghosts of Afghanistan - Steele, Jonathan

Goldstone Recants - Norman G. Finkelstein

Goliath - Max Blumenthal

How to Win a Cosmic War_ Confronting Radical Religion - Aslan, Reza

Imperial Life in the Emerald City - Chandrasekaran, Rajiv

In the Lion's Den_ An Eyewitness Account of Washington's Battle with Syria - Tabler, Andrew

In the Shadow of the Sword - Tom Holland

Iran_ A Beginner's Guide - Homa Katouzian

Iraq_ From War to a New Authoritarianism - Dodge, Toby

Islamophobia_ Thought Crime of the Totalitarian Future - Robert Spencer

Islam_ A Very Short Introduction - Ruthven, Malise

It's Not About Religion - Harms, Gregory

Judaism_ A Very Short Introduction - Solomon, Norman

Knowing Too Much - Norman G. Finkelstein

Little America_ The War within the War for Afghanistan  - Chandrasekaran, Rajiv

Nations and Nationalism since 1870 - E. J. Hobsbawm

No God But God_ The Origins, Evolution, and Future of Islam - Aslan, Reza

No Place to Hide - Glenn Greenwald

Old Wine, Broken Bottle_ Ari Shavit's Promised Land - Norman G. Finkelstein

Overthrow - Kinzer, Stephen

Pity the Nation_ Lebanon at War - Fisk, Robert

Righteous Victims - Morris, Benny

SO WRONG FOR SO LONG  - Mitchell, Greg

Syria's Uprising and the Fracturing of the Levant - Emile Hokayem

Syria_ From the Great War to Civil War - John McHugo

Syria_ From the Ottoman Empire to the Rise of the Ba'ath  - Kevin Weese

Syria_ The Case for Non-Intervention - Steve Massey

The Blood Never Dried - Newsinger, John

The British Empire_ A Very Short Introduction - Jackson, Ashley

The Ethnic Cleansing of Palestine - Ilan Pappe

The First World War_ A Very Short Introduction - Howard, Michael

The Gamble - Thomas E. Ricks

The General's Son_ Journey of an Israeli in Palestine - Miko Peled

The Great Derangement - Matt Taibbi

The Great War for Civilisation - Fisk, Robert

The History of Syria_ 1900-2012 - M. Clement Hall

The Holocaust Industry - Norman G. Finkelstein

The Invention of the Jewish People - Shlomo Sand

The Invention of the Land of Israel - Shlomo Sand

The Middle East - Philip Robins

The Palestine-Israel Conflict_ A Basic Introduction - Harms, Gregory

The Palestinian-Israeli Conflict_ A Very Short Introduction - Bunton, Martin

The President of Good and Evil - Peter Singer

The Qur'an (Oxford World's Classics) - M. A. S. Abdel Haleem

The State of Africa_ A History of the Continent Since Independence - Martin Meredith

The State of Syria_ Past, Present, and Future - Charles Glass

The Story of Christianity - David Bentley Hart

The United Nations (Beginner's Guide) - MacQueen, Norrie

This Time We Went Too Far - Norman G. Finkelstein

Vultures' Picnic - Palast, Greg

What Gandhi Says - Norman G. Finkelstein

Zealot_ The Life and Times of Jesus of Nazareth - Reza Aslan
